QuestData.Title: All-Seeing Eye
QuestData.Description: I perceive the questions that burn within your mind and I must confess that I share in your uncertainty... a rare position for one such as I, and a most unsettling one.$b$bAs I scour time to find traces of this obscured event, you must aid me in the creation of an Eye, both to test your worthiness, and to provide an essential tool in the unraveling of this mystery.$b$bVenture into the Plane of Fire, $c, and gather Eternal Embers. Bring them to me with Sands of Time and I will create the Eye.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 25 Eternal Embers from The Firelands and 3 Sands of Time.
QuestData.CompletionText: Well, $c?$b$bHave you acquired the necessary materials?
